門.definition: gate; door; CL:扇[shan4]; gateway; doorway; CL:個|个[ge4]; opening; valve; switch; way to do something; knack; family; house; (religious) sect; school (of thought); class; category; phylum or division (taxonomy); classifier for large guns; classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology; (suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

門人.definition: disciple; follower; hanger-on (at an aristocrat's home)

門冬.definition: abbr. for 天門冬|天门冬[tian1 men2 dong1], asparagus

門可羅雀.definition: lit. you can net sparrows at the door (idiom); fig. completely deserted

門坎.definition: variant of 門檻|门槛[men2 kan3]

門坎兒.definition: erhua variant of 門坎|门坎[men2 kan3]

門墩.definition: wooden or stone block supporting the axle of a door

門子.definition: door; doorman (old); hanger-on of an aristocrat; social influence; pull; classifier for relatives, marriages etc

門對.definition: couplet (hung on each side of the door frame)

門市部.definition: retail department; section of a retail store

門庭如市.definition: see 門庭若市|门庭若市[men2 ting2 ruo4 shi4]

門庭若市.definition: front yard as busy as a marketplace (idiom); a place with many visitors

門戶.definition: door; strategic gateway; portal; faction; sect; family status; family; web portal; (old) brothel

門戶開放.definition: open door policy; Egyptian President Sadat's infitah policy towards investment and relations with Israel

門扇.definition: door; the opening panel of a door

門把.definition: door knob; door handle; also pr. [men2 ba4]

門捷列夫.definition: Dmitri Ivanovich Mendeleev (1834-1907), Russian chemist who introduced the periodic table

門栓.definition: variant of 門閂|门闩[men2 shuan1]

門楣.definition: lintel (of a door); fig. family's social status

門檻.definition: doorstep; sill; threshold; fig. knack or trick (esp. scheme to get sth cheaper)

門派.definition: sect; school (group of followers of a particular doctrine)

門源.definition: Menyuan Hui Autonomous County in Haibei Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 海北藏族自治州[Hai3 bei3 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

門源回族自治縣.pinyin: mén yuán huí zú zì zhì xiàn
門源回族自治縣.definition: Menyuan Hui Autonomous County in Haibei Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 海北藏族自治州[Hai3 bei3 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

門源縣.definition: Menyuan Hui Autonomous County in Haibei Tibetan Autonomous Prefecture 海北藏族自治州[Hai3 bei3 Zang4 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 zhou1], Qinghai

門球.definition: croquet; goal ball (served by the goal keeper)

門環.definition: door knocker (in the shape of a ring)

門當戶對.definition: the families are well-matched in terms of social status (idiom); (of a prospective marriage partner) an appropriate match

門禁.definition: restrictions on entry and exiting; control over access

門羅.definition: Monroe (name); James Monroe (1758-1831), fifth US president

門聯.definition: couplet (hung on each side of the door frame)

門興格拉德巴赫.pinyin: mén xìng gé lā dé bā hè

門路.definition: way of doing sth; the right social connection

門道.definition: the way to do sth; knack

門閂.definition: horizontal bar to hold a door closed (made of wood or metal); door bolt

門面.definition: shop front; facade; CL:間|间[jian1]; prestige

門額.definition: area above the lintel of a doorway
